item.title: Help with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Virtuo Virtuo
item.description:
@Virtuo wrote:

Well I have an NPCDrops.java, I’m using Devolution V7 and I’m wondering how to set drops to monsters. This is the code I have in the file:

[code]
public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}[/code]

Can anyone help? Should I edit some other file and where and how?
If you cannot help me can you reply anyway that you can’t because
no one ever replies and I really need help

Read full topic
